context.prior_knowledge: Elementary online learning experience and foundational language learning concepts

learning_goals: Learners can apply core concepts of chaos and complexity theories (e.g., self-organization, nonlinear interactions) to the context of distance education design.

The learner submits one customized instructional design plan for a small group of 5 learners within a limited technological environment (1 tablet, offline tools) within one week and achieves a suitability score of 80% or higher in peer evaluation and instructor feedback.
Learners develop at least three formative assessment tools that promote language learning in real-time online environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
